experience: You and Paul both know Premal Shah, Jim (James) Van Dyke, and 3 others

Responsible for defining and managing requirements for future Online Commercial capabilities supporting Dell's B2B Digital Strategy. Defining new end-to-end purchase experience and platform capabilities. Leading Product Management and Dev Team using Agile framework. The team are responsible for $15 billion a year in eCommerce revenue; setting up new global eCommerce standards and making sure that Customers are provided with a cohesive branded experience across all digital channels.

Responsible to create and execute company's B2B digital strategy to substantially increase online products, services offering and online sales. Fixed-term contract during 1st year of my International MBA program. This strategic role was corresponding with my Diploma Dissertation on Digital Business Transformation.

• Act as a Digital Transformation Advocate and Product Lead for digital applications including web presence,  mobile solutions and social networking in a business context. • Embed digital skills and competencies into the business - hiring, team building, people management activities including distribution of work assignments and performance management. Built and led highly skilled and successful digital delivery team in a newly opened GE office in Krakow, Poland. • Suggested and implemented Online Product Management Framework and changes to simplify release management• Worked with Vendor Management to negotiate deals with solution providers• Planned and executed knowledge transfer from external IT consultants to keep the IP in-house and enable an effective, quality Digital Solutions Delivery.

Reporting to the VP of Platform & Product Management. My role was to ensure AVG delivers a highly optimized end-to-end security service experience globally; define, validate and optimize the Platform capabilities (built and/or bought), specifically: • Platform Capabilities – clear and concise requirements generation and prioritization across revenue generating quick wins and longer term capability investments • Customer Engagement – ensure AVG has the right in-product and desktop messaging capabilities• Customer Entitlements – define requirements for AVG MyAccount services – a new space for AVG Customers• CMS & eCommerce Platform Product Management• Lead eCommerce Steering Committee and prioritize initiatives• Payments and billing initiatives; payments ecosystem and relationships • Planned and requested ad-hoc business-critical projects: PRDs creation, impact assessment, cross functional demand, rapid prototyping, executive approvals and walkthrough sessions, identifying core team members for best effectiveness

• Define B2B and B2C products based on market analysis and company’s goals - Monster.com Web, Mobile and Tablet Apps, Virtual Job Fares, Talent Management System, Career Ad Network products.  Solutions for Jobseekers and Employers.• Create and own the product strategy for a designated product portfolio; align EU Business Unit's product set with current and perceived market opportunities through new product launches, product modifications and product decommissioning strategies

summary: Customer-centric and results-driven professional with 15 years of Product Management and Digital Delivery Leadership experience gained at global technology companies such as PayPal,  AVG Technologies, GE, and Dell.  Passionate about Product Innovation, eCommerce, and online payments.  Experienced in Scrum/Agile & waterfall framework, Digital Business Transformation, short-term MVP and long-term investments, ideation process (leading multi-disciplinary groups through strategic planning, user research, customer journey mapping, brainstorming, requirements gathering, definition and prioritization, gap analysis, prototyping and testing), make vs. buy evaluation, Proof-of-concept definition and product evolution, Pre and Post Implementation Impact Assessment, eCommerce & CMS platforms.  Proven track-record of establishing effective Digital Product Delivery Teams, managing large-scale >$20M projects, consultants, partners and vendors.  Established relationships with major vendors and industry experts.  International, multi-cultural experience gained by living and working in Ireland (6 years); Czech Rep. (4 years), and my home country - Poland.  Demonstrated effective negotiations, relationship building, influencing and cross-functional cooperation in an international environment.  Solid portfolio of innovative web, mobile and desktop products delivered at leading dot-com companies that are setting up new industry standards.  MBA (St. Gallen Business School, Switzerland and Krakow University of Economics) - on-site program.     Diploma Dissertation: "Leading Digital Business Transformation"​Specialties: Leading Product Management, Technology Groups and Solutions Delivery. Roadmapping, Scrum/Agile and Waterfall, PM framework optimization, Consumer & B2B digital products, eCommerce & CMS Platforms Implementation (Hybris, IBM WCS, Oracle ATG, AEM). Digital Payments - Subject Matter Expert.Other interests: HAM Radio  (call-sign: SQ7IKR), Licensed Open Water Lifeguard.
